section.title: Plain search results clustering response: x-carrot-clustering-plain-response
section.para: This format encapsulates a plain response of a search engine to a user query (see. ). The response includes the original query and a list of query-matching documents, described by at least an &url; and optional title and extracted snippet of text.

important.para: This data format only specifies the required elements of the &xml; structure. It may contain additional elements not defined here (see for an extension example) — components should ignore any elements they do not understand.
Repeating the query tag in the output is strongly suggested although for some input components it may be impossible and for this reason this element is left as optional.
